title: Calm Your Anxiety: Sleep Meditation for Soothing Difficult Emotions
description:
Ease any worries or concerns and drift off into a deep rest with this calming sleep meditation.

Want access to an ad-free version of this episode? Try Deep Sleep Sounds Premium free for 7 days: https://sleepsounds.supercast.com/.
